name: The nine levels of MICTLAN
description:
Submission for GGJ2022 (Theme: Duality)

You have been beheaded, now you must go through the tests of Mictlan to reach eternal life!

Controls

Keyboard:

  • WASD to move the body
  • Arrow keys to move the head

Gamepad:

  • Left analog stick to move the body
  • Right analog stick to move the head.

How to play

Simple! just use your body parts to solve the puzzles and put the head over the shoulders at the end of each level to unlock the next one!
